name: The Fool
meaningUpright: A leap of faith, optimism, and openness to the unknown.
meaningReversed: Pause before jumping; gather information and ground yourself.

name: The Magician
meaningUpright: Resources are in your hands—focus and make it real.
meaningReversed: Check motives and clear distractions before proceeding.

name: The High Priestess
meaningUpright: Listen to your inner knowing; the answer is within.
meaningReversed: Something is hidden—pause and allow truths to surface.

name: The Empress
meaningUpright: Growth and comfort bloom when you care for yourself and others.
meaningReversed: Replenish yourself; create from fullness, not depletion.

name: The Emperor
meaningUpright: Lead with clarity and boundaries; build a lasting foundation.
meaningReversed: Flexibility is needed—release the grip to regain balance.

name: The Hierophant
meaningUpright: Seek wisdom in trusted teachings and community.
meaningReversed: Question stale rules; craft a path aligned with your values.

name: The Lovers
meaningUpright: A heartfelt choice or partnership asks for honest alignment.
meaningReversed: Reconnect to your values before making commitments.

name: The Chariot
meaningUpright: Momentum builds when will and purpose move together.
meaningReversed: Realign your course; forcing it only skids the wheels.

name: The Sun
meaningUpright: Warmth, visibility, and confidence shine on your path.
meaningReversed: Step into the light gently; celebrate progress even if muted.

name: The Moon
meaningUpright: Move with the tide of intuition; not everything is linear.
meaningReversed: Name the fear; clarity grows when you investigate the shadows.

name: Ace of Cups
meaningUpright: A fresh wellspring of emotion and connection opens up.
meaningReversed: Tend to your own cup before pouring out to others.

name: Three of Wands
meaningUpright: You can see the horizon—take the next bold step.
meaningReversed: Break the stall by adjusting plans and trusting your vision.
